information.changelog:
* Added a new host template
* Added new service templates
* Added service discovery commands
* Added host discovery rules

description.value:
**Plugin Pack to monitor Nutanix system using SNMP protocol**

Available host templates and related services:

|Virt-Nutanix-SNMP |Virt-Nutanix-Container-SNMP|Virt-Nutanix-Hypervisor-SNMP|Virt-Nutanix-VM-SNMP|
|------------------|---------------------------|----------------------------|--------------------|
|Cluster Usage     |Iops                       | Cpu                        |Cpu                 |
|Container Usage   |Latency                    | Iops                       |Iops                |
|Disk Usage        |Storage                    | Latency                    |Latency             |
|Hypervisor Usage  |                           | Memory                     |Traffic             |
|Storage Pool usage|                           | Vm-count                   |Power-State         |
|Vm Usage          |                           |                            |                    |

This Plugin Pack provides sevral host discovery *providers* for containers, hypervisors and virtual machines, to be used with the Host Discovery module.

Please note that service templates are not necessarily linked to the related host template.

**Pack Plugin pour surveiller les systèmes Nutanix en utilisant le protocole SNMP.**

Modèles d\'hôtes disponibles et services associés :

|Virt-Nutanix-SNMP |Virt-Nutanix-Container-SNMP|Virt-Nutanix-Hypervisor-SNMP|Virt-Nutanix-VM-SNMP|
|------------------|---------------------------|----------------------------|--------------------|
|Cluster Usage     |Iops                       | Cpu                        |Cpu                 |
|Container Usage   |Latency                    | Iops                       |Iops                |
|Disk Usage        |Storage                    | Latency                    |Latency             |
|Hypervisor Usage  |                           | Memory                     |Traffic             |
|Storage Pool usage|                           | Vm-count                   |Power-State         |
|Vm Usage          |                           |                            |                    |


Ce Plugin Pack fournit plusieurs fournisseurs de découverte d\'hôtes (containers, hyperviseurs et machines virtuelles) à utiliser avec le module de découverte d\'hôtes.

Veuillez noter que les modèles de service ne sont pas nécessairement liés par défaut au modèle d\'hôte correspondant.

information.monitoring_procedure:
# Monitoring procedure ## Prerequisites ### Centreon Plugin Install this plugin on each needed poller: # yum install centreon-plugin-Virtualization-Nutanix-Snmp ## SNMP Installation Read the [Nutanix to configure SNMP on your server] ### Troubleshooting Read [Troubleshooting SNMP](https://documentation.centreon.com/docs/centreon-plugins/en/latest/user/guide.html#snmp) ## Centreon Configuration ### Create a host using the appropriate template Go to *Configuration > Hosts* and click *Add*. Then, fill the form as shown by the following table:
Field Value

Host name

Name of the host

Alias

Host description

IP

Host IP Address

Monitored from

Monitoring Poller to use

Host Multiple Templates

Virt-Nutanix-SNMP

Relations > Parent Hostgroups tab
Click on the *Save* button.
information.name: Nutanix
